long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Perfect integration between Hubspot and Linkedin.

- Instantly see which LinkedIn profiles are already in your HubSpot.
- Save LinkedIn profiles into your HubSpot with one click.
- Set your settings in LinkMatch so that profiles are saved in a way you want.
- View and edit all the profile's related data without leaving LinkedIn. You can see profile data, activities, emails, tasks right inside of LinkedIn.

By installing this Chrome Extension you agree to the Terms of Service - linkmatch.net/terms
______

Browser permissions description for compliance with Chrome WebStore policies:

- tabs: for finding a tabs which has LinkedIn or Xing launched to show notification if needed
- cookies: to be able to make API calls to HubSpot Web API
- https://*.hubapi.com/* - to be able to make requests to HubSpot REST API
- https://*.hubspot.com/* a- - to be able to make requests to HubSpot Web API
- https://*.linkedin.com/* - to be able to make requests to linkedin.com
- https://*.xing.com/* - to be able to make requests to xing
- https://*.linkmatch.net/* - API calls to LinkMatch(application server)
